name: Message From The Futur
description:
First prototype of a game where your futur self try to help you survive unpredictable stuff. The game is very short for now but we hope you'll like it !

controls : 

"e" for actions, "space" to jump," s" to crouch

art : Instagram @eolinaliasstephy

All asset were made during the jam except the music:

music :  Kevin Macleod - Pixelland
